T02TD2483E:180b-0: @180b * // yan lag dam tshig ces bya ba //
T02TD2483E:180b-1: dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i //
T02TD2483E:180b-2: rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang //
T02TD2483E:180b-3: tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang //
T02TD2483E:180b-4: gsad ba'i chos ni ston pa dang //
T02TD2483E:180b-5: sems can dad dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2483E:180b-6: dam chos gzhan du ston pa dang //
T02TD2483E:180b-7: nyan thos dag tu rlom byed pa'i //
T02TD2483E:180b-8: nang du zhag bdun gnas pa dang //
T02TD2483E:180b-9: sbyor ba nges par ma byas par //
T02TD2483E:180b-10: skal min gsang ba ston pa dang //
T02TD2483E:180b-11: gang zhig phyag rgya mi mkhas la//
T02TD2483E:180b-12: lus kyi phyag rgya ston pa dang //
T02TD2483E:180b-13: bsnyen sogs dag par ma byas par //
T02TD2483E:180b-15: sdom pa gnyis kyi bcas pa la //
T02TD2483E:180b-16: dgos pa med par 'da' ba ni //
T02TD2483E:180b-18: sngags pa de yi dam tshig zad //
T02TD2483E:180b-20: bdud dang sdug bsngal mang du 'phel //
T02TD2483E:180b-21: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2483E:180b-22: nyin re zhing ni bzla sbar bya //
T02TD2483E:180b-23: yan lag gi dam tshig ces bya ba rdzogs so//
